scripts.test: npm run jshint && npm run mocha
scripts.jshint: jshint app.js Reports.js sample-reports-config.js test/test-config.js test/testApp.js test/testReports.js
scripts.build-docs: jsdoc -d docs package.json sample-reports-config.js app.js Reports.js
scripts.build: npm test && npm run build-docs && npm run coverage
